title: Scrub Field
description: A grassy meadow punctuated by shrub and scrub. The grasses range in height from less than a meter to nearly two meters tall in places. Lush, green grasses wave gently in the wind. Wildflowers grow among the grasses. The land is gently sloped up to the north, gently sloped down to the east, gently sloped down to the south, gently sloped up to the west.
